name: Shipwreck (itch) (Brushfire Games, Nick Gravelyn)
description:
Shipwreck is a top down adventure game in which you must travel the land, explore dungeons, and defeat monsters to earn safe passage off the island on which you are stranded. Shipwreck is the first game from Brushfire Games, a small game studio outside of Seattle, WA run by brothers Nick and Joe Gravelyn.

Shipwreck was created by these fine folks:

  • Nick Gravelyn - Design/Programming
  • Joe Gravelyn - Design/Programming
  • Ty Lagalo - Art
  • Dan Waters - Audio
